abstract: algory : the cryptocurrency trading platform for everyone .
article: introductioneveryone wants a comfortable life . we spend our life achieving it , finding ways and means to earn more . we are our own master . some form of activity is selected to earn and survive . commodity trading is one of the oldest activity performed by humans since ages . when currency was introduced , it became the trading partner of the commodity . different parts of the world have different currency . there are common agreement and exchange rates available for trade between two countries . we have come a long way since creating a market for traders to trade and share profits with the stakeholders of the company .

latest technological innovation is constantly blurring the lines between what is possible and what is not . latest in the list is cryptocurrency , which is making everyone hold their breath . they are amazed at its growth and return on investment . those who invested in it are thanking their luck , while those who could not are searching for ways to do it now . it has made traders revise their strategy and goals . it has become something no one can ignore . the returns are huge and the market is running high as never seen before .

the general public is looking for ways to earn their share of profits . the difficulty with cryptocurrency market is the ambiguous policy guidelines existing in many countries . nyse and nasdaq are top global stock trading points of the world . but , trading in cryptocurrency is complicated because of its revolutionary nature which has left governments of the different countries perplexed . the crypto trading and crypto asset exchange exists , and people aware of the process are reaping the benefits . one of the top accounting firms in the world pricewaterhousecoopers accepted bitcoin payment for the first time .

but , cryptocurrency is still not into the mainstream business , and traders are still not able to trade in the crypto assets . there needs to be a platform which provides traders and investors with the guidelines for crypto assets and cryptocurrency . it can be a source of information and gateway to the digital currency . the platform must be suitable for traders and investors , as well as the general public . solution offeredalgory is presenting a solution which identifies the needs of traders with a helping hand while providing solutions to trade and invest in the cryptocurrency .

their advance application is based on an algorithm which facilitates best trading practices and strategies to the traders . their tool is innovative , credible , and complex yet simple to use . few of the top products available on their platform are listed below . cryptoscanner : it works as a scanner which scans the cryptomarkets to provide the best crypto asset available . it provides the real-time update from the major crypto exchanges . it helps the user to choose the best route for investment in cryptocurrency . an ai-based algorithm is the foundation of the platform .

it has many predefined filters and custom built features available for general users as well as professional traders . cryptonews : this platform works as the news aggregator where every news of the world related cryptocurrency is available for the users . there is an option for selection of a source for the user . it is equivalent to your personal and customised newsroom . it aggregates all the information related to cryptocurrency based on user choices . trading room : a 24/7 live platform for trading purposes is available for users and professional traders . a company representative will be available for further help .

blockchain analyser : it analyses the blockchain based platforms . it provides a facility for event tracking and monitoring for hot and cold wallets . it will also analyse the value of cryptocurrency . ico analyser : this is the best route available for raising fund for companies . the platform analyses the different icos available in the market . all the data related to the ico is available on the platform . it helps in the studying of the different icos through its ico analyser which is based on latest technology . cryptocurrency back tester : there are optimized filters available and it helps in strategizing the cryptocurrency investment decisions .

it is very easy to assess profits made under different decisions . arbitrage cryptocurrency scanner : this platform provides the opportunities for strategic traders to compare different coin prices . the algorithm will predict optimal arbitrage path for different prices . auto trading : this platform provides automation facilities based on the crypto scanner . it performs the task automatically depending on the filters and criteria set by the user . chart signal and analytics : this function provides the necessary chart and graphs for analysis and planning to the user . there is also the option of directly placing your order from the graph and charts , which are defined by the filters set by the user .

social learning : this feature helps in the learning and understanding the cryptocurrency . there will be tutorials and learning materials available for traders and investors . exchange comparator : it can be used for the purpose of comparison between different cryptocurrency exchanges available in the market . it is a very useful tool for traders . cryptocoin : all the information about the cryptocurrency can be found here . it is a beneficial tool for the general public who are very keen on understanding the world of cryptocurrency . cryptoviwer : this is the final and most important tool for the platform .

it provides aggregated information about all the cryptocurrency available and their exchange value in the market . this is a key feature of their product which is in the under-development stage . ico information & teamthey are conducting a public crowd sale of algory token under the ticker alg from 8th december 2017 to 8th january 2018 . the tokens can be used to access powerful applications of algory platform . the funds collected will be used for the research and development of the product . their scale of the product portfolio is huge and requires a great amount of investment and right people .

they have a tremendously talented team of engineers , traders , investors , and serial entrepreneurs . algory has decided to build an ecosystem of cryptocurrency trading mechanism which will be smooth , transparent , and secured . we must be a contributor to build this platform for future trading . authored by : etheran .
